original_title: The Best of Liandra Dahl and Friends, volume 1
overview: Welcome to the world of Liandra Dahl - kinky, funny, queer, genuine and fresh! In her first volume, there are three shorts entitled Fucking with Barbie, Give and Take, and Sequoia & Kenni. In the opening number, we meet the lady herself in a funny and fascinating solo scene. In the middle chapter, an outgoing couple experiment with toys and roles for maximum pleasure. The volume finishes with two women using every possible means of titillation in an slow, hypnotic encounter.
title: The Best of Liandra Dahl and Friends, volume 1
